feed.title: Combined summary - Fwd: Services bit for xthin blocks

entry.title: Combined summary - Fwd: Services bit for xthin blocks
entry.summary: On March 8th, 2016, Dave Scotese proposed the idea of a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP), but expressed concern about making specific proposals. Instead, he suggested a more general approach of using bit(s?) 4(-5?) as user-agent. However, he noted that this approach would be useless for discovery since it is not communicated in address messages. He suggested that any feature that could use this approach could instead utilize the BIP130 approach.
